summary: A test suite that quickly validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of the CogVideoX Fun Control video generation pipeline, using synthetic components and inputs to check callbacks, attention slicing, fused QKV projections, inference behavior, batch handling, and VAE tiling.
business_intent: Provide rapid, automated verification of the pipeline's correctness and efficiency to reduce regression risk, accelerate development cycles, and ensure high-quality video generation for endâ€‘users.
